display_name: Patient Health Questionnaire 9: Poor appetite or overeating
description:
Item from Patient Health Questionnaire 9-item. [Kroenke K et al. 2001 (PubMED ID: 11556941)](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC1495268/)

[Search for all PHQ-9 variables within this dataset](https://sleepdata.org/datasets/stages/variables?search=phq9)
domain: 0=not at all, 1=several days, 2=more than half the days, 3=nearly every day
